name: The Great Escape (itch) (Chief)
description:
The Great Escape from hell.

You find yourself woken up from a deep slumber, and you find yourself in hell. Kill the enemies and get out of that place!

CONTROLS (VERY IMPORTANT) :

W A S D to control the player

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON to make a shield which costs 10 energy.
